overview: Lovely renditions of classic children's songs, nursery rhymes and lullabies fill this special Kidsongs program. You'll enjoy introducing your little ones to beautiful songs like Paul Simon's "St. Judy's Comet," The Beatles' classic "Goodnight" and Crosby, Stills & Nash's "Our House." Ease your young one's transition from a busy day to bedtime with these gentle songs.
title: Kidsongs: Good Night, Sleep Tight
